title: 65. Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with WAI Think Tank
itunes:title: 65. Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with WAI Think Tank
description: What is architecture and what is its frontier of thinking in the time of Corona Virus? This week, we talk with WAI Think Tank about their backgrounds, their multi-dimensional practice, and how they think architecture will be affected by this global pandemic.
content:encoded: What is architecture and what is its frontier of thinking in the time of Corona Virus? This week, we talk with WAI Think Tank about their backgrounds, their multi-dimensional practice, and how they think architecture will be affected by this global pandemic.
